entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Mildred Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023
